description:
After Lum and Ataru run across a series of ill omens, Cherry recommends they turn around their fortunes by drawing Omikuji. However, their quest for good fortune quickly goes awry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Darling`s Ill Omen! The Dreaded Shijimoto Oracle!!
ダーリン大凶! 恐怖の四次元おみくじ!!
